Class DatabaseUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.DatabaseUtil
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationReviewController

    public class DatabaseUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of functions for interacting with the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseUtil()
      Creates a connection to the database.

      • addReview

        public void addReview(int fid,
                      int status,
                      int decider,
                      java.lang.String date,
                      java.lang.String general,
                      java.lang.String originCode,
                      java.lang.String brandName,
                      java.lang.String facifulName,
                      java.lang.String grapeVar,
                      java.lang.String wineVintage,
                      java.lang.String appellation,
                      java.lang.String bottler,
                      java.lang.String formula,
                      java.lang.String sulfite,
                      java.lang.String legibility,
                      java.lang.String labelSize,
                      java.lang.String description)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a review object to the database. This function needs the fid value to be the same as one row in form table.
        Parameters:
        fid - Form ID number.
        status - Application status.
        decider - Reviewer of the application.
        date - Review date.
        general - General information.
        originCode - Code of origin location for the application.
        brandName - Application brand name.
        facifulName - Application fanciful name.
        grapeVar - Grape type for wines.
        wineVintage - Vintage year for wines.
        appellation - Place of origin for wines.
        bottler - Bottler name.
        formula - Formula for the alcohol.
        sulfite - Sulfite content of the alcohol.
        legibility - Metric representing legibility of the label.
        labelSize - Size of the label.
        description - Label description.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • searchUnassignedForms

        public java.util.ArrayList<ApplicationData> searchUnassignedForms()
                                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets a list of all Applications that have the status "UNASSIGNED".
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of the IDs of the unassigned Applications. The IDs are represented by Strings.
